text: Andrew Maxwell Haden (26 September 195029 July 2020) was a New Zealand rugby union player and All Blacks captain. He played at lock for Auckland and New Zealand from 1972 until 1985. He also played club rugby in the United Kingdom and Italy. He was born in Wanganui, New Zealand. In 2003, Haden announced that he was beginning chemotherapy for chronic lymphocytic leukaemia. He died on 29 July 2020 in Auckland, aged 69. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from chronic lymphocytic leukemia Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: Andy Haden
